title: Lyft Discrimination Investigation
description: We are looking for people willing to stand up for LGBTQ+ rights and fair treatment from rideshare companies.

title: Healthcare Data Breach
description: Zimmerman Reed is representing patients impacted by healthcare data breaches. If you think you may have been impacted by a healthcare data breach, we can help.

title: Hims & Hers GLP-1 Ozempic-Style Injections Deceptive Advertising Claims
description: We are investigating whether Hims & Hers may have violated consumer protection laws and FDA regulations.

title: Mortgage Data Privacy Investigations
description: We are investigating several mortgage companies that may have violated privacy laws by using internet tracking software called pixels to collect and disclose sensitive information tied to online loan applications and loan inquiries without customer consent.

title: Blackstone Fake Discount Investigation
description: We are currently investigating Blackstone for allegedly displaying fake discounts for products sold on its website, ranging from its wetsuits to the rest of its product line.

title: Healthcare Insurance Investigation
description: We are investigating whether health insurance companies may have violated the law by failing to obtain the most cost-effective healthcare options for you and other employees.

title: Omnilux Deceptive Advertising Claims
description: We are investigating whether Omnilux has marketed its LED products in ways that may have misled consumers.

title: Egg Price Fixing and Antitrust Investigation
description: If you own a business and purchased a fragrance compound or ingredient from a fragrance product distributor, you may have overpaid as a result of this alleged price fixing scheme.
